required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of a Modified SOX Regimen in First-Line Treatment of Unresectable Gastric Adenocarcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Trial Evaluate a Modified SOX Regimen in First-Line Treatment of Unresectable Gastric Adenocarcinoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

clinical_study.source: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a modified regimen of oxaliplatin and S-1 on unresectable gastric adenocarcinoma in the first-line therapy.

detailed_description.textblock:
Primary endpoint: Overall Response Rate
Secondary endpoint: Time to progression, overall survival, safety data

primary_outcome.measure: Overall response rate according to RECIST 1.1

intervention.description: Oxaliplatin 85mg/m2 D1 and S-1 40mg/m2 BID D1-D10, repeat every two weeks; Efficacy will be evaluated every three cycles.

overall_official.affiliation: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

facility.name: Sixth Affiliated Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sixth Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University
